Space planes, i just can't build Space planes that take off from the runway, so if anyone would be willing to give me tips i would love any advice. specifically the accent path from runway to orbit and TWR of jets and rockets that is required so please help me and thanks in advance.

Also Space Shuttle design as in the kind that are launch on the back of a rocket. how do i set the engines so that my entire thing doesn't spin in orbit due to weird COM? and any launch advice would be appreciated.

Again thanks in advance for any advice:D.
